title: What are the best websites to follow the latest technologies and developments in information technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are lots of good, broad sources that have been covered in other answers, such as WIRED, Mashable, and TechCrunch. Pick a few of these general sources, and add to them sources that help you see technology from different perspectives. Examples: University Research and Tech Startups: MIT Technology ReviewGovernment: Federal Technology News and Analysis for IT Managers & Acquisition TeamsTech venture capital: Tech Market IntelligenceOpen Source projects: Homepage | Opensource.comMaker community: Home | Make: DIY Projects and Ideas for MakersAlso, check out PwC’s Next In Tech blog for a look at how these different perspectives on emerging tech impact business.

Here a list of websites I think are extremely good in the technology section: Product reviews, how-tos, deals and the latest tech news on Cnet- this is my top choice as it has constant articles about different topics concerning many areas of technology. It also has reviews and how-to-do videos which are very helpful.The Verge- created in 2011 is an excellent source for any information related to smartphones, laptop and tablets.TEA- all news about Apple and includes podcast and reviews. It also approached major news on the technology field.These are the three websites I use everyday for tech news and I find them extremely useful
